description: Your Dream Home Awaits at Kensal Walk in Windsor Gate by Polygon. Discover comfort, convenience, and community in this beautifully maintained, one-owner townhouse located in one of Coquitlam's most sought-after neighborhoods. Perfectly situated within walking distance to Coquitlam Centre, T&T Supermarket, the library, parks, and SkyTrain, this home offers unbeatable access to everything you need. Families will appreciate the proximity to top-rated schools—including Pinetree Secondary, & other schools just minutes away. Enjoy sun-drenched mornings in your southeast-facing private backyard, nestled in the best location of the complex—backing a quiet greenbelt and facing no other front doors. Inside, you're greeted by a bright, open layout w/Gourmet kitchen. Enjoy the luxurious Nakoma Club.
